NStar seeking natural gas rate cut

The boom in domestic natural gas production is leading local utilities to seek the lowest winter gas rates in a decade, even as heating oil prices have climbed. (Globe)

A recently unearthed audio recording provides a rare glimpse of the introspective John F. Kennedy - unsure of his political skills and surprisingly honest about his poor health. (Boston Globe)
